Who are we

Domas Bitvinskas

A rockstar developer who is actively pushing coding to the edge by bringing futuristic tools to the present.

Works with Ruby on Rails for more than 3 years. Professional coder at SameSystem. Freelances on Ionic, Angular.js, React.js and Meteor js.

Constantly pushes his fears forward by doing all kinds of extreme sports - from skydiving to snowboarding.

Also develops Open-Source libraries of the future

Benas Bitvinskas

(obviously, we are brothers)

A rising star in the design world. Willing to stand on his head if this makes for a better user experience. Also digs brand design and does professional design for more than a year.

Our process

We can do almost any task you can think of. From the conception of an idea, to a fully fledged product thats shipped to thousands of users.

We are committed to find the best process to make the world a better place in the most efficient way.

This is what we usually do

Make sure we understand each other

Do a Google Hangout with you and discover what your secret wishes are.

Gather initial data

Write the user stories to be as close to reality as possible.

Design the prototype

Do this in InvisionApp and collaborate on making the user experience perfect.

Prototype the app

Choose the best framework for the job and make a working prototype. Framework selection includes Ruby on Rails, Ionic, Angular.js, Meteor.js, React.js.

Do callaborated testing

Improve the design on your feedback and lock it up with tests.

Add metrics

Track every step of the user for easier future decision making. Use Segment.com, Mixpanel and Google Analytics.

Ship it

Select the best hosting solution for the job. Choose between Heroku and a VPS.

Analyze

Use the data from metrics to improve the designs and get the last percents of the conversion rate.

Enough, enough. Let's start hitting it hard together
